attributes.action: Bring back the right to buy discount to what it was this is very unfair.
attributes.additional_details: So that everyone who has a council property gets a fair chance of the old discount amount,most people was not aware and was not ready for the deadline.
attributes.background: I would like parliament to look into the fact that some of us didn't even know there was a deadline,and this is very much unfair to change the amount of discount to what it was before.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: 

Bring back full Right to buy discount & give notice of future changes
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/726223
